name: HeliFly
description: Helicopter to Tail Slide or Deep Stall directly connected into an Infinite Tumbling. The Tail Slide/Deep  Stall must not necessarily be long but shall be entered directly from the exit a Helicopter

criterias.normal: Rhythm, flow, trajectory (no roll movement), tension in the lines and glider, duration, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: Twisted on the entry, untwist by the helicopter  and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling without twist
criterias.twisted exit: stay twisted during the exit of the Infinity Tumbling
criterias.full twisted: Twisted on the entry and stay twisted until the exit of the infinity tumbling
criterias.hardcore entry: Same as full twisted but with change of twist direction in the entry of the mac twist
criterias.cab slide: get twisted during an infinity tumbling turn
criterias.devil twist: from a twisted situation, change of twist direction (within one turn)

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling or Anti-Rhythmic SAT
